subject: Business
title: Servant Leadership
description: Learn Servant Leadership in one minute.

hook.text: The CEO of Southwest Airlines spent holidays loading luggage alongside ground crew. Morale soared.

buildup.text: Robert Greenleaf proposed servant leadership: the leader's primary role is to serve the team, not command it.

discovery.text: Servant leaders remove obstacles, develop people, and put the team's needs above their own status.

twist.text: Critics say servant leadership sounds soft. In practice, it demands more discipline than command-and-control.

climax.text: Costco's CEO earned $650K while competitors earned $20M+. Low ego, high results. Servant leadership at scale.

punchline.text: The best leaders serve. The team does the rest.

quiz.question: What is the core idea of servant leadership?
options: The leader's primary role is to serve the team's needs
Leaders must always follow their team's decisions
